data.title: Rhythmic Gymnast Alexandra Orlando to blog during Beijing Olympics 2008
data.meta_description: The sensuous rhythmic gymnast from Canada Alexandra Orlando will be blogging during the Olympic Games. Well if you think the blog has been created just for itsy bitsy ranting then you are mistaken. She will write in couple of blogs. I don’t know whether she herself will write the entries, the way I do..hehe..or some… Read More »Rhythmic Gymnast Alexandra Orlando to blog during Beijing Olympics 2008
data.text:
The sensuous rhythmic gymnast from Canada Alexandra Orlando will be blogging during the Olympic Games. Well if you think the blog has been created just for itsy bitsy ranting then you are mistaken.

She will write in couple of blogs. I don’t know whether she herself will write the entries, the way I do..hehe..or some professional writer will do the ghost writing for her.

Both the blogs are part of marketing and advertising campaigns from Lenovo and CBC. Lenovo, the Chinese giant has asked athletes from around the world to do blogging for them. You may get a look at it at www.summergames.lenovo.com (update: site does not exist anymore).

She also blogs for CBC.
